body: I had already written a [patch](https://github.com/golang/go/files/419195/diff.txt) when you closed the issue, and it doesn't really increase the complexity of this function much - it adds a second `hashPrefixes` map corresponding to the *other* valid prefix for each SHA*-RSA choice. If your response was written with the goal of not implementing real ASN.1 code as opposed to an opposition to any increase in complexity at all, it might still be worth implementing in order to conform to the spec.
